gg.acai.aurora.hierarchy

Class HierarchyClusterClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • gg.acai.aurora.hierarchy.HierarchyClusterClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clusterer, MLContextProvider, Predictable, java.lang.Iterable<HierarchyClusterFamily>

    public class HierarchyClusterClassifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements Clusterer, java.lang.Iterable<HierarchyClusterFamily>
    A recursive hierarchical cluster classifier, classifying nodes into families based on their distance from the centroid or closest node.
    Since:
